# Pull Request (PR)

## Pull Request Title
<!--
The title should succinctly explain the changes.
Example: "Add search functionality to the homepage"
-->

---

## Description
<!--
Provide a brief description of the changes your pull request makes.
Explain the problem it solves or the feature it adds.
Include any relevant issue or ticket references.
-->

---

## Type of Change
Please select the relevant option(s):

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update required

---

## How Has This Been Tested?
<!--
Describe how you tested these changes.
Include:
- Test environment
- Tests executed
- Edge cases checked
-->

---

## Checklist
- [ ] I have read the CONTRIBUTING.md document
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have added or updated tests to cover my changes
- [ ] My changes do not introduce breaking changes (or they are documented)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation where necessary
- [ ] I have commented complex or non-obvious parts of the code
